pageContext.claim: “The Fox Impeachment poll has turned out to be incorrect. This was announced on Friday. Despite this, the Corrupt New York Times used this poll in one of its stories, no mention.... of the correction which they knew about full well! ‘Fox News Pollster Braun Research Misrepresented Impeachment Poll: Analysis’ @NYPost”
pageContext.analysis: The Fox News poll found that 51 percent of Americans favored Trump's impeachment. It relied on sound methodology.
